text: Bob Metcalfe of the Xerox Palo Alto Research Center wrote a memo on an IBM selectric typewriter, outlining how to connect personal computers to a shared printer. Metcalfe says "If Ethernet was invented in any one memo, by any one person, or on any one day, this was it."
Namco released an arcade game called Puck-Man. When it was released in the US in October the name was altered to Pac-Man.
Microsoft released Windows 3.0. It featured big improvements in interface and multitasking. It's Control Panel feature caught the eye of Apple which sued, and lost.
